segments.text: I notice the boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how precarious that stool looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mom knows they're sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so expectant, like she's waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip over and hurt them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit nerve-wracking to watch, but also kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both quite clever, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they've already eaten.
segments.speaker: PAR
